job.title: Network Engineer // Cisco // DFW
job.description: Motion Recruitment is partnering up with a global leader in Infrastructure Services to help them bring on a Cisco Network Engineer. This will be a 3 month contract-to-hire position in Irving, Texas.<br><br>As a Cisco Network Engineer, your scope of work will involve new virtual ASA configurations within a cloud environment for disaster recovery services.<br><br><strong><u>Skills &amp; Experience<br></u></strong><ul><li>3+ years of Network Administration experience (routers, switches, firewalls</li><li>Experience supporting Cisco network infrastructure and devices</li><li>Expertise with Cisco Routing and Switching - Catalyst series required, Nexxus a plus</li><li>Experience with Wireless LAN Controllers (WLCs, WAPs)</li><li>Basic troubleshooting and supporting firewalls (Cisco ASA / Firepower; Palo Alto, Checkpoint)</li><li>CCNA or CCNP<br></li></ul><strong><u>The Offer<br></u></strong><ul><li>Competitive Pay: Up to $60/hr, DOE</li><li>Contract Duration: 3 month contract-to-hire<br></li></ul><strong><u>You Will Receive The Following Benefts<br></u></strong><ul><li>Medical &amp; Dental Insurance</li><li>Health Savings Account (HSA)</li><li>Paid Time Off</li><li>Pre-tax Commuter Benefits<br></li></ul><strong>Posted By:</strong> Carolyn Regimbal<br><br>
